articles.title: South Korea reverses loosening of mask mandate, ramps up curbs as cases soar - The Washington Post
articles.description: The country reported 1,316 new coronavirus cases on Friday, setting a record for the second day running. It had been one of the first East Asian nations to lay a path out of the pandemic.

articles.title: Salary dispute claims fell in 2020 despite economic downturn, COVID-19 restrictions - channelnewsasia.com
